content: First Half_1, Sporting Kansas City, Thommy, 1 (Kinda), 4th minute; 2, Sporting Kansas City, Pulido, 1 (Thommy), 31st.

Second Half_3, Seattle, Lodeiro, 1 (penalty kick), 66th.Goalies_Sporting Kansas City, Tim Melia, John Pulskamp; Seattle, Stefan Frei, Stefan Cleveland, Andrew Thomas.Yellow Cards_Roldan, Seattle, 8th; Walter, Sporting Kansas City, 12th; Ndenbe, Sporting Kansas City, 65th; Rusnak, Seattle, 81st; Russell, Sporting Kansas City, 90th+6.Referee_Victor Rivas. Assistant Referees_Lyes Arfa, Mike Rottersman, Carol Anne Chenard. 4th Official_Jeremy Kieso.___Sporting Kansas City_Tim Melia; Andreu Fontas, Logan Ndenbe, Dany Rosero; Jake Davis, Gadi Kinda (Felipe Hernandez, 46th), Erik Thommy (Roger Espinoza, 76th), Remi Walter; Alan Pulido (Graham Zusi, 85th), Johnny Russell, Daniel Salloi (Khiry Shelton, 79th).Seattle_Stefan Frei; Yeimar Gomez Andrade, Jackson Ragen; Reed Baker-Whiting (Cody Baker, 57th), Leo Chu (Fredy Montero, 57th), Nicolas Lodeiro, Alex Roldan, Albert Rusnak, Obed Vargas (Dylan Teves, 84th); Heber, Jordan Morris.
